name: MESTROIDS
description:
Welcome to MESTROIDS

Maneuver through the onslaught of asteroids plummeting toward your ship in hopes to eventually return home in one piece. Collect and spend coins to obtain gear to aid you on your travels through space.

- TAP to maneuver through fields of asteroids.
- EARN currency to spend on gear.
- GEAR up to give your pilot with much needed fun enhancements.
- HIGH SCORE to earn complimentary durability fixes.
- DESTROY asteroids that are in your path.

MESTROIDS
